title: Better.com CEO Apologizes for ‘Blundered’ Zoom Firings
sub_head: Vishal Garg says he made a bad situation worse, after video meeting where hundreds were fired went viral
body:
The chief executive of online mortgage lender Better.com apologized after a video of him firing hundreds of workers on a Zoom conference call last week was posted on TikTok and viewed by millions.
“I own the decision to do the layoffs, but in communicating it I blundered the execution,” CEO Vishal Garg said in a letter posted on the company’s website. “In doing so, I embarrassed you.”
